Root Cause: Memory exhaustion due to high RAM usage.

Detailed Root Cause Analysis.Observations: Memory usage exceeded 90%, leading to process termination and system unresponsiveness.
Detailed Root Cause Analysis.Impact: System instability and termination of critical processes.
Detailed Root Cause Analysis.Correlations: Linked to high memory usage warnings and system unresponsiveness.

Explanation.Conclusion: High RAM usage caused memory exhaustion and system instability.
